name: Progress Bar & Skill Bar
author: wpshopmart

sections.description:
An awesome wordpress progress bar plugin to show skills in percentage at any blog or post page. Progress Bar plugin is useful for an author for his/her website for showing skills. The Progress Bar plugin adds beautiful progress bars or progress meter by generating a shortcode.

  • Progress Bar Pro – Live Demo
  • Upgrade To Pro

Plugin calculates the progress by showing animated styling percentage and displaying very cool progress bar with multiple colorschemes.

Check Demo

  • Progress Bar Style1 Demo
  • Progress Bar Demo

Progress Bar WP Shortcode

[PROGRESSBAR_WP id=xx]

Find More Free Plugins from our profile – wpshopmart

  • Testimonial Builder
  • Counter Numbers
  • Accordion FAQ
  • Service Box
  • Coming Soon Page
  • Tabs

Features Of Plugin

  • Two awesome animated designs
  • Responsive Design
  • Build with Bootstrap
  • Html5 supported
  • Works with any WordPress Theme
  • Unlimited color Scheme
  • Flexible and user-friendly setup
  • Quick Installation Process
  • Animation Effects
  • Compatible with all browsers
  • Add or remove progress bar easily.

Progress Bar Pro Features

  • Fully Responsive And Clean Design
  • No. Of Design Templates 34
  • No of column layout 4
  • Chart Style Layout
  • Half pie chart(circular) bar layout
  • Section Background integrated
  • All COlors, Font size, font family etc are changeable.
  • Add Limitless skill bar anywhere in the theme
  • Animation Effects
  • Drag and Drop builder API integrated.
  • Draggable box items for easy sorting
  • Use via short-codes
  • Awesome input field for progress content
  • Bootstrap framework based
  • Custom Post Format
  • Less for quick customization
  • Highly customized for User Experience
  • Slick Front-end and back end UI
  • Tested with most wordpress popular themes
  • Custom css for custom design
  • Add and remove Team item from backend Quickly.
  • Multiple Advanced Custom Field Available
  • High Priority support

  • All browser compatible

  • Progress Bar Pro – Live Demo

  • Upgrade To Pro

Customizable Settings

  • Progress Bar Name
  • Progress Bar Title color
  • Progress Bar Handle color
  • Progress Bar Font family
  • Progress Bar Column Layout
  • Progress Bar Percentage color
  • Progress Bar Foreground Color
  • Progress Bar Background Color
  • And many More..
sections.faq:
What is Progress Bar plugin?

Progress bar plugin is helpful to create progress bar on any page or post. This plugin shows skills in percentage in animated styling.

How it’s work?

You will need to just Add a new progess bar and set values and other attribute and than copy shortcode of progress bar. After publish it. Copy this code in any post or pages.

How to display it on Page?

Just create progress bar and after publish it copy shortcode and just paste this code on any page or paste. After update the page. Progress bar will be display.
